briefdescription.para: Compile time constant representing what kind of schema this class is.
Construct a PhysxSchemaPhysxDiffuseParticlesAPI on UsdPrim prim .

detaileddescription.para: Equivalent to PhysxSchemaPhysxDiffuseParticlesAPI::Get(prim.GetStage(), prim.GetPath()) for a valid prim, but will not immediately throw an error for an invalid prim

briefdescription.para: Construct a PhysxSchemaPhysxDiffuseParticlesAPI on the prim held by schemaObj .

detaileddescription.para: Should be preferred over PhysxSchemaPhysxDiffuseParticlesAPI(schemaObj.GetPrim()), as it preserves SchemaBase state.

briefdescription.para: Destructor.
Enable or disable the creation of diffuse particles.
See GetDiffuseParticlesEnabledAttr(), and also Usd_Create_Or_Get_Property for when to use Get vs Create.

detaileddescription.para: If specified, author defaultValue as the attribute's default, sparsely (when it makes sense to do so) if writeSparsely is true - the default for writeSparsely is false.

briefdescription.para: Maximum number of diffuse particles.

detaileddescription.para: Range: [0, inf)

briefdescription.para: See GetMaxDiffuseParticlesAttr(), and also Usd_Create_Or_Get_Property for when to use Get vs Create.

detaileddescription.para: If specified, author defaultValue as the attribute's default, sparsely (when it makes sense to do so) if writeSparsely is true - the default for writeSparsely is false.

briefdescription.para: Kinetic energy threshold a particle must reach to spawn a diffuse particle.

detaileddescription.para: Range: [0, inf) Units: energy = mass * distance * distance / seconds / seconds

briefdescription.para: See GetThresholdAttr(), and also Usd_Create_Or_Get_Property for when to use Get vs Create.

detaileddescription.para: If specified, author defaultValue as the attribute's default, sparsely (when it makes sense to do so) if writeSparsely is true - the default for writeSparsely is false.

briefdescription.para: Lifetime of a spawned particle before it is removed again.

detaileddescription.para: Range: [0, inf) Units: seconds

briefdescription.para: See GetLifetimeAttr(), and also Usd_Create_Or_Get_Property for when to use Get vs Create.

detaileddescription.para: If specified, author defaultValue as the attribute's default, sparsely (when it makes sense to do so) if writeSparsely is true - the default for writeSparsely is false.

briefdescription.para: Air drag force factor for spray particles.

detaileddescription.para: Range: [0, inf) Units: dimensionless

briefdescription.para: See GetAirDragAttr(), and also Usd_Create_Or_Get_Property for when to use Get vs Create.

detaileddescription.para: If specified, author defaultValue as the attribute's default, sparsely (when it makes sense to do so) if writeSparsely is true - the default for writeSparsely is false.

briefdescription.para: Fluid drag force factor for bubble particles.

detaileddescription.para: Range: [0, inf) Units: dimensionless

briefdescription.para: See GetBubbleDragAttr(), and also Usd_Create_Or_Get_Property for when to use Get vs Create.

detaileddescription.para: If specified, author defaultValue as the attribute's default, sparsely (when it makes sense to do so) if writeSparsely is true - the default for writeSparsely is false.

briefdescription.para: Buoyancy force factor for bubble particles.

detaileddescription.para: Range: [0, inf) Units: dimensionless

briefdescription.para: See GetBuoyancyAttr(), and also Usd_Create_Or_Get_Property for when to use Get vs Create.

detaileddescription.para: If specified, author defaultValue as the attribute's default, sparsely (when it makes sense to do so) if writeSparsely is true - the default for writeSparsely is false.

briefdescription.para: Contribution from kinetic energy when deciding diffuse particle creation.

detaileddescription.para: Range: [0, inf) Units: dimensionless

briefdescription.para: See GetKineticEnergyWeightAttr(), and also Usd_Create_Or_Get_Property for when to use Get vs Create.

detaileddescription.para: If specified, author defaultValue as the attribute's default, sparsely (when it makes sense to do so) if writeSparsely is true - the default for writeSparsely is false.

briefdescription.para: Contribution from pressure when deciding diffuse particle creation.

detaileddescription.para: Range: [0, inf) Units: dimensionless

briefdescription.para: See GetPressureWeightAttr(), and also Usd_Create_Or_Get_Property for when to use Get vs Create.

detaileddescription.para: If specified, author defaultValue as the attribute's default, sparsely (when it makes sense to do so) if writeSparsely is true - the default for writeSparsely is false.

briefdescription.para: Contribution from divergence when deciding diffuse particle creation.

detaileddescription.para: Range: [0, inf) Units: dimensionless

briefdescription.para: See GetDivergenceWeightAttr(), and also Usd_Create_Or_Get_Property for when to use Get vs Create.

detaileddescription.para: If specified, author defaultValue as the attribute's default, sparsely (when it makes sense to do so) if writeSparsely is true - the default for writeSparsely is false.

briefdescription.para: Decay factor of diffuse particles' lifetime after they collide with shapes.

detaileddescription.para: 0 == lifetime remains unchanged, 1 == particle disappears immediately. Range: [0, 1] Units: dimensionless

briefdescription.para: See GetCollisionDecayAttr(), and also Usd_Create_Or_Get_Property for when to use Get vs Create.

detaileddescription.para: If specified, author defaultValue as the attribute's default, sparsely (when it makes sense to do so) if writeSparsely is true - the default for writeSparsely is false.

briefdescription.para: Enables accurate particle velocity estimation.
See GetUseAccurateVelocityAttr(), and also Usd_Create_Or_Get_Property for when to use Get vs Create.

detaileddescription.para: If specified, author defaultValue as the attribute's default, sparsely (when it makes sense to do so) if writeSparsely is true - the default for writeSparsely is false.

briefdescription.para: Return a vector of names of all pre-declared attributes for this schema class and all its ancestor classes.

detaileddescription.para: Does not include attributes that may be authored by custom/extended methods of the schemas involved.

briefdescription.para: Return a PhysxSchemaPhysxDiffuseParticlesAPI holding the prim adhering to this schema at path on stage.

detaileddescription.para: If no prim exists at path on stage, or if the prim at that path does not adhere to this schema, return an invalid schema object. This is shorthand for the following:

briefdescription.para: Applies this single-apply API schema to the given prim.

detaileddescription.para: This information is stored by adding "PhysxDiffuseParticlesAPI" to the token-valued, listOp metadata apiSchemas on the prim.

simplesect.para: A valid PhysxSchemaPhysxDiffuseParticlesAPI object is returned upon success. An invalid (or empty) PhysxSchemaPhysxDiffuseParticlesAPI object is returned upon failure. See UsdPrim::ApplyAPI() for conditions resulting in failure.

briefdescription.para: Returns the type of schema this class belongs to.
Applied to a PhysxParticleSystem.

detaileddescription.para: Defines settings that the particle system uses to spawn diffuse particles.
